N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.20 - Medical isolation

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of this Part, each correctional facility which
operates an infirmary shall develop and implement procedures for medical
isolation. (b) There shall be at
least one isolation room in each correctional facility which operates a
facility infirmary. (c) Additional
isolation rooms shall be provided at a ratio of one isolation room for every 30
infirmary beds. Notes
